SEARCH
Package Engine

Class TaskScheduler.SchedulerTask

java.lang.Object
Engine.TaskScheduler.SchedulerTask
All Implemented Interfaces:
Task
Direct Known Subclasses:
TaskScheduler.ForEachTask, TaskScheduler.SchedulerTaskParam
Enclosing class:
TaskScheduler
public class TaskScheduler.SchedulerTask extends Object implements Task
Represents a task that can be scheduled and executed by the TaskScheduler.
